How many people are affected by spastic paraplegia type 8 ?,"The prevalence of all hereditary spastic paraplegias combined is estimated to be 1 to 18 in 100,000 people worldwide. Spastic paraplegia type 8 likely accounts for only a small percentage of all spastic paraplegia cases.",GHR,spastic paraplegia type 8
